metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6869 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A `<dialog>` element could have been manipulated to paint contentoutside of a sandboxed iframe. This could allow untrusted content todisplay under the guise of trusted content. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 121.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
